@-moz-document domain("vk.com") {
/*—à—Ä–∏—Ñ—Ç—ã –±–µ–∑ —Å–≥–ª–∞–∂–∏–≤–∞–Ω–∏—è* + –±–µ–ª—ã–π —Ñ–æ–Ω*/

body {
    background: #ffffff !important;
    margin: 0;
    padding: 0;
    direction: ltr;
    font-size: 13px;
    font-family: tahoma, arial, verdana, sans-serif, Lucida Sans;
    line-height: 1.154;
    font-weight: 300;
    -webkit-font-smoothing: auto;
    -moz-osx-font-smoothing: auto;
}

data.name: Mastodon & Glitch-soc Variable Width
data.description: Make sure you set your instance by pressing "Customize Settings" above, if you are not on mastodon.social! To handle more than one instance, you will need to install this and then edit it. Instructions are inside the CSS. Based on Mastodon Wide, but scales with browser's width. Should be safe to mix with other styles. Contact @siina@cute.science if you have any questions, comments, or concerns!
